term.title: stereochemical formula

item.text: A three-dimensional view of a molecule either as such or in a projection.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2193. 'Basic terminology of stereochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2218 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122193)
